name: 2D Cat Wants Out
description:
Made in 48 hours for #LD37! Theme: One Room

Help 2D Cat get out of each room by turning the world upside down, every which way!

I really want to make better puzzles with this mechanic. I don't think I've nailed the puzzle aspects of this mechanic.

The physics is a bit wonky, and I do apologise for whatever bugs crept in!
